objectives: Students will discuss shopping and consumer behavior using Formal/Business register language
Students will engage with Historical themed scenarios related to shopping and consumer behavior
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of formal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining shopping and consumer behavior content with Historical narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore shopping and consumer behavior through a Historical lens using Formal/Business language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a historical period or event involving shopping and consumer behavior

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice formal register vocabulary related to shopping and consumer behavior in a historical context
Students engage in historical themed role-play about shopping and consumer behavior using formal register
Students create original historical themed content about shopping and consumer behavior in formal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe shopping and consumer behavior in a Historical scenario?
What tradition or heritage might be involved in shopping and consumer behavior?
Can you create a Historical story about shopping and consumer behavior?
How does shopping and consumer behavior change when viewed through a Historical perspective?
What formal register expressions would you use to discuss this historical scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Historical situation involving shopping and consumer behavior
roles: Character A: Using formal register in historical context
Character B: Responding in formal register within historical theme

topic_genre_blend: shopping and consumer behavior with tradition
shopping and consumer behavior with heritage
shopping and consumer behavior with legacy

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Formal/Business throughout: Professional, business-appropriate language
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Historical theme: Past eras, historical events, period settings

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Formal/Business register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Historical themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of formal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
